articles.title: The glowing light that offered clues about Mercedes' F1 recovery plan - Autosport
articles.description: Eagle-eyed observers of Formula 1's Australian Grand Prix could not help but notice a strange glowing light coming from beneath Lewis Hamilton's car at points of the race on Sunday.

articles.author: Sean Smith
articles.title: Pay first shows PwC partners could pocket up to $3.7 million a year - The West Australian
articles.description: Audit and consulting giant PwC has broken with its rivals by publicly revealing pay levels for its Australian staff, with partners set to pocket up to $3.7 million next year.
